## IWaitForExitOptions interface

The options for running a process to completion using [Executable.waitForExitAsync()](./node-core-library.executable.waitforexitasync_2.md)<></>.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IWaitForExitOptions 
```

BufferEncoding \| 'buffer'

_(Optional)_ The encoding of the output. If not provided, the output will not be collected.

</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether or not to throw when the process completes with a non-zero exit code. Defaults to false.


</td></tr>

</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether or not to throw when the process is terminated by a signal. Defaults to false.
